quote_first: The first maroon had been fired at
quote_last: and the second a few moments later. The puffs of green smoke from the maroons were still hanging in the sky above when Pete arrived, breathless but still running.
quote_raw: The first maroon had been fired at 08.36 and the second a few moments later. The puffs of green smoke from the maroons were still hanging in the sky above when Pete arrived, breathless but still running.
title: Lifeboat!
author: Margaret Dickinson
